   19: %%
   20: -module(beam_ssa_check_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: %% Runs tests checking the structure of BEAM SSA code.
   23: 
   24: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   25: -include_lib("stdlib/include/erl_compile.hrl").
   26: 
   27: -export([all/0, suite/0, groups/0,
   28:          init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   29: 	 init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   30: 
   31:          alias_checks/1,
   32:          annotation_checks/1,
   33:          appendable_checks/1,
   34:          bs_size_unit_checks/1,
   35:          no_reuse_hint_checks/1,
   36:          private_append_checks/1,
   37:          ret_annotation_checks/1,
   38:          sanity_checks/1,
   39:          tuple_inplace_checks/1]).
   40: 
   41: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   42: 
   43: all() ->
   44:     [{group,post_ssa_opt_dynamic},{group,post_ssa_opt_static}].
   45: 
   46: groups() ->
   47:     [{post_ssa_opt_static,test_lib:parallel(),
   48:       [alias_checks,
   49:        annotation_checks,
   50:        appendable_checks,
   51:        no_reuse_hint_checks,
   52:        private_append_checks,
   53:        ret_annotation_checks,
   54:        sanity_checks,
   55:        tuple_inplace_checks]},
   56:      {post_ssa_opt_dynamic,test_lib:parallel(),
   57:       [bs_size_unit_checks]}].
   58: 
   59: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   60:     test_lib:recompile(?MODULE),
   61:     Config.
   62: 
   63: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   64:     ok.
   65: 
   66: init_per_group(post_ssa_opt_dynamic, Config) ->
   67:     TargetDir = dynamic_workdir(Config),
   68:     ct:log("Creating working directory for generated test cases: ~p~n",
   69:            [TargetDir]),
   70:     ok = file:make_dir(TargetDir),
   71:     Config;
   72: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   73:     Config.
   74: 
   75: end_per_group(post_ssa_opt_dynamic, Config) ->
   76:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
   77:     TargetDir = filename:join(PrivDir, "dynamic"),
   78:     case proplists:get_bool(keep_generated, Config) of
   79:         false ->
   80:             ct:log("Removing working directory for generated test cases: ~p~n",
   81:                    [TargetDir]),
   82:             file:del_dir_r(TargetDir);
   83:         true ->
   84:             Config
   85:     end;
   86: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   87:     Config.
   88: 
   89: alias_checks(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   90:     run_post_ssa_opt(alias, Config),
   91:     run_post_ssa_opt(alias_non_convergence, Config),
   92:     run_post_ssa_opt(alias_chain, Config),
   93:     run_post_ssa_opt(ss_depth_limit, Config).
   94: 
   95: annotation_checks(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   96:     run_post_ssa_opt(annotations, Config).
   97: 
   98: appendable_checks(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   99:     run_post_ssa_opt(appendable, Config).
  100: 
  101: bs_size_unit_checks(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  102:     gen_and_run_post_ssa_opt(bs_size_unit_checks, Config).
  103: 
  104: no_reuse_hint_checks(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  105:     run_post_ssa_opt(no_reuse_hint, Config).
  106: 
  107: private_append_checks(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  108:     run_post_ssa_opt(private_append, Config).
  109: 
  110: tuple_inplace_checks(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  111:     run_post_ssa_opt(tuple_inplace_checks, Config),
  112:     run_post_ssa_opt(tuple_inplace_abort0, Config),
  113:     run_post_ssa_opt(tuple_inplace_abort1, Config),
  114:     run_post_ssa_opt(tuple_inplace_abort2, Config),
  115:     run_post_ssa_opt(tuple_inplace_abort3, Config).
  116: 
  117: ret_annotation_checks(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  118:     run_post_ssa_opt(ret_annotation, Config).
  119: 
  120: sanity_checks(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  121:     run_post_ssa_opt(sanity_checks, Config).
  122: 
  123: dynamic_workdir(Config) ->
  124:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  125:     filename:join(PrivDir, "dynamic").
  126: 
  127: run_post_ssa_opt(Module, Config) ->
  128:     File = atom_to_list(Module) ++ ".erl",
  129: 
  130:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  131:     Source = filename:join(DataDir, File),
  132:     run_checks(Source, post_ssa_opt, Config).
  133: 
  134: run_checks(SourceFile, Pass, _Config) ->
  135:     Flags = [binary, deterministic, {check_ssa,Pass}, report_errors],
  136:     case compile:file(SourceFile, Flags) of
  137:         {ok,_,_} -> ok;
  138:         error -> ct:fail({unexpected_error, "SSA check failed"})
  139:     end.
  140: 
  141: gen_and_run_post_ssa_opt(Base, Config) ->
  142:     BaseStr = atom_to_list(Base),
  143:     GenFilenameBase = "gen_" ++ BaseStr,
  144:     GenModule = list_to_atom(GenFilenameBase),
  145:     GenFilename = filename:join(proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  146:                                 GenFilenameBase ++ ".erl"),
  147:     ct:log("Compiling generator ~s~n", [GenFilename]),
  148:     {ok,GenModule,GenCode} = compile:file(GenFilename, [binary]),
  149:     {module,GenModule} = code:load_binary(GenModule, GenFilename, GenCode),
  150:     TargetFileName = filename:join(dynamic_workdir(Config), BaseStr ++ ".erl"),
  151:     ct:log("Generating ~s~n", [TargetFileName]),
  152:     ok = GenModule:generate(TargetFileName, Config),
  153:     run_checks(TargetFileName, post_ssa_opt, Config).
